shri lankawata wiruddhawa chandaya bhawitha kalada ee ee ratawal samanga sidukerena rajyathanthrika sabandathawanhi kisindu wenasak sidu nowana bawa widesha katayuthu amathyanshaya awadharanaya karayi.lokaye sama ratak samangama sahayogiwa kriyakarana shri lankawe widesha prathipaththiya kisindu aakarayakin wenas nowana bawada pawathina widesha saha aarthika sabandatha lihil kirime kisindu awashyathawayak lak rajayata nomathi bawada widesha katayuthu amathyanshaye lekam karunathilaka amunugama mahatha “dinamina”ta pawasiya.shri lankawata erehiwa jagath manawa himikam kawunsalaya wetha amerikawa idiripath kala yojanawa sammatha kara gaththada lokaye kuda ratak wana ape ratatada mithuru ratawal wishala pramanayak sitina bawata ehidi samastha lokaya hamuwe penwimata awasthawa labunu bawada ee mahatha sandahan kaleya.jagath manawa himikam kawunsilayedi indiyawa gath thiranayata abhiyoga nokarana bawa sandahan kala widesha katayuthu amathyanshaye lekamwaraya indiyawa saha shri lankawa athara ithihasaye patan sabandatha pawathina bawada kisi witekath eewa binda nowatena bawada prakasha kaleya.me athara ee mahatha sandahan kale abhyanthara washayen indiyawe pawathina deshapalana thaththwayan hethuwen me piyawara ganna bawata prakashayak kara thibena bawayi.mewani yojana sammatha kara gaththada shri lankawa lokaye sama ratak samangama wenadatath wada honda sahayogayakin katayuthu kirimata sudanam bawada ee mahatha sandahan kaleya..
